Class CommunoteBundleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.osgi.CommunoteBundleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    LocalizationResolverBundleListener, ResourcesResolverBundleListener, VelocityTemplateMappingResolver

    public abstract class CommunoteBundleListener
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleListener
    Marker interface for bundle listeners specific for Communote.
